name: Golf 'n Dice
description:
THE GAME:

A minigolf simulator, where the dices decide how your next move will be. Play through different levels getting the dice into the hole!

CONTROLS:

Click and drag on the dice to adjust the power of your shot

Press enter after putting to roll a new dice

Press backspace to reset a level if you exhaust all your dice
